translation.en: Honestly, when I watch movies, I hardly ever pay attention to who made it.
translation.hi_ng: saccha yi se , jab mi ne dekte hu movies ko, mi ne utna attention nahi rakta hu, ye koun banaya hi.

translation.en: have you?
translation.hi_ng: aap kuch?

translation.en: Nope. I am a sucker for movies with animated animals though so I will definitely have to check this out.
translation.hi_ng: nahi. muje toh animated animal movies koh pasand hein toh mein jarur usse check karunga

translation.en: Yea, Judy Hopps is the main character and is considered the first ever bunny cop. Sounds funny.
translation.hi_ng: yea, judy hopps toh main character hein, aur voh toh pehla bunny cop hein. badi funny laga

translation.en: Agreed. There's a comment at the bottom about species stereotypes which sounds interesting too
translation.hi_ng: maantha hoon. kuch species stereotype ka comment bottom mein hein bahut interesting laga

translation.en:
But they thought she would be able to handle being a cop
 because shes a bunny.
translation.hi_ng: lakin sab sochthe the ki yek bunny kaise cop bana aur voh kaise handle kar paathe

translation.en: Most of the cop or police are normally these big animals.
translation.hi_ng: kahi cop yar police toh badi badi animals hi role play karte.

translation.en: Yep. Which to me is a bit counterintuitive because you think of rabbits being a prey species so more likely to run away from trouble.
translation.hi_ng: haan. muje bhi thoda counterintuitive laga kyon ki rabbit toh yek prey species hein aur voh toh trouble mein run karna hi pasand karega

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.hi_ng: bilkul

translation.en: Of course the fox has to be the bad guy
translation.hi_ng: haan aur fox toh bad guy hein

translation.en: Actually, he is displayed as the slick fox. Always trying to con his way in to something.
translation.hi_ng: actually, voh toh alick fox ko dekhayi gaya hein... kabhi bhi voh usko ache ke taraf hi le ja raha tha

translation.en: But he turns out to be a good guy.
translation.hi_ng: lakin voh toh good guy nikhla

translation.en: I'm trying to figure out who otterton and Manchas are from the new paragraph that flashed up
translation.hi_ng: mai figure out karne ki koshish kar raha ahi ki otterton aur Manchas kya new paragraph se flash up hue hai

translation.en: Oh so like another goes away from the norm type of character in the fox
translation.hi_ng: are to ye ek aur gaya apne fox ke character se door

translation.en: Key scene two shows rabbit and fox working together!
translation.hi_ng: key scene me rabbit aur fox dono ko together working karte dikhaya hai

translation.en: Otterton is a missing person that judy is trying to find
translation.hi_ng: otterton ek missing person hai jise judy dhundhne ki koshish kar rahi hai

translation.en: Judy kind of blackmailed Nick(fox) in working with her.
translation.hi_ng: Judy ne lagbhag Nick(fox) ko blackmai kiya uske sath work karne ke liye

translation.en: I see. It sounds like a movie that has a well developed story line
translation.hi_ng: I see, yah to us movie ki tarah sound kar raha hai jiska ek well developed story line hai

translation.en: It was a very good kids movie.
translation.hi_ng: yah kids ki lye badhiya movie thi

translation.en: I'm just shocked that it wasn't as big as the Disney movies
translation.hi_ng: mujhe ye dekh ke shock laga kiy Disney movies ki tarah badi nahi hai

translation.en: Oh ok. I'm a little bit wary of rotten tomato ratings also
translation.hi_ng: Oh ok, mai bhi rotten tomato ki rating ko lekar dukhi rahta hu.

translation.en: They can sometimes stray quite far from the other review sites of a bunch of very keen reviewers want to bump the score
translation.hi_ng: kabhi kabhi wo dusri review sites se jo kuch keen reveiwers ke dwara hoti hai kafi bhatak jate hai

translation.en: Ok scene three has some drug manufacturing going on!
translation.hi_ng: Ok scene three me kuch drug manufacturing ho rahi hai.

translation.en: Yes, the drugs make the animals revert to their natural state.
translation.hi_ng: Yes, drugs animals ko wapas unki natural state me le aati hai.

translation.en: Oh so there must be some other force making them break moulds
translation.hi_ng: oh wanha par kuch dusra force bhi hona chahiye unko break moulds banane ke liye.

translation.en: They become crazy animals again
translation.hi_ng: Wo fir se crazy animals ban gaye.

translation.en: But this is all while they still think Judy is a small cop
translation.hi_ng: but ye sab tab bhi hai jab unhe laga thai ki Judy small cop hai

translation.en: so they still dont consider her a strong animal
translation.hi_ng: so wo abhi bhi use strong animal nahi consider karte.

translation.en: I see. Interesting. Hope she gets more respect later with all the arrests
translation.hi_ng: I see, Interesting. Hope baki arrests ke baad use or jyada respect mile

translation.en: yea she does
translation.hi_ng: Yea usne kar dikhaya

translation.en: would you see this movie?
translation.hi_ng: Kya tum se movie dekhoge?

translation.en: Jim Carrey is a great actor that has had a lot of major roles in movies. What is your favorite movie with Jim Carrey?
translation.hi_ng: Jim Carrey badhiya actor hai aur bahut movies me major role kiya hai. Tumhari jim carrey ki favorite movie kaunsi hai

translation.en: I enjoyed Liar Liar the most. He has a lot of good movies though. What did you like about Bruce Almighty?
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe Liar Liar sabse jyada pasand aayi. Uski waise to bahut acchi movies hai. Bruce Almighty kaise lagi?

translation.en: I enjoyed that Bruce Almighty was a comedy because I enjoy a good laugh. I also liked how the movie introduced God, which not many movies do. What did you like most about Bruce Almighty?
translation.hi_ng: Muujhe Bruce Almighty acchi lagi kyuki wo comedy thi aur mujhe comedy pasand hai. Mujhe ye bhi accha laga kaise usme god aya jo ki sab movies me nahi ata. Tumhe Bruce almighty me sabse jyada accha kya laga?

translation.en: Do you think that the movie deserves the rating that it received?
translation.hi_ng: Kya tumhe lagta hai ki film uss rating ko deserve krta hai jo usko mili thi?

translation.en: Yes I liked the role of Morgan Freeman as "God" also. I also like the setting of the movie which is memorable to me because Im from Buffalo.
translation.hi_ng: Han mujhe "God" ke role mein Morgan Freeman ka character bahut pasand aaya. Mujhe film ki setting bhi pasand hai jo mere liye yaadgaar hai kyunki Im buffalo se.

translation.en: I think it was rated pretty low. What score would you have given it?
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe lagta hai iski rating bahut low hui hai. Kya score diya hai tumne ise?

translation.en: Oh that is interesting! Morgan Freeman is another great actor. His voice can be used in many settings and roles.
translation.hi_ng: Oh yeh to intresting hai! Morgan Freeman bhi ek or achha actor hai. Uski awaaz bahut si settings and roles mein use ki jaa skti hai.

translation.en: I think that it should have been rated higher. It seems like rotten tomatoes always gives low ratings though.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe lagta hai ki iski rating zyada honi chahiye thi. Haanlanki rotten tomatoes hamesha kam rating deta hai.

translation.en: Wasn't there a sequel to this movie?
translation.hi_ng: Kya iss movie ka koi sequel hai?

translation.en: Do you feel like this movie was a breakout movie for Jim Carrey?
translation.hi_ng: Kya tumhe lagta hai ki yeh movie Jim Carrey ke liye breakout tha?

translation.en: Im not 100% sure. But it did have like an open end to the movie
translation.hi_ng: Main 100% sure nhi huin. But ye ek open end ki tarah tha iss movie ke liye

translation.en: I think that he has a lot of recognition for being in this movie. But I am not sure of other movies he was in before this one.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe lagta hai iss movie mein bane rehne ke liye uske bahut pehnchaan hai. But main sure nhi huin ki isse pehle dusri movies kaisa tha.

translation.en: I think Ace Ventura and the Mask may have come out before this. Not sure
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe lagta hai ki isse pehle Ace Ventura and the Mask bahar aa gye honge. Sure nhi huin

translation.en: I also enjoyed him in the Grinch movie. He is able to perform many different roles across many genres of movies.
translation.hi_ng: muje grinch movie pasand hein. voh kaafi role mein perform karthe

translation.en: Has he played any serious movie roles like a drama?
translation.hi_ng: kya kuch serious movie yaani drama me bhi play keye hein kya?

translation.en: I am not sure about that. He seems to be more of a comedian type actor.
translation.hi_ng: muje patha nahi hein. lekin voh comedian type ka actor hein

translation.en: Do you know any other movies by this director?
translation.hi_ng: kya aap ko is director ka aur koi movies patha hein?

translation.en: If you were in a similar situation as Bruce (like in the key scene mentioned), would you feel frustrated as well?
translation.hi_ng: tho Bruce yaani keyscene ke tarah lag raha hein. kya aapko thoda frustrated feel hota hein

translation.en: I have not heard of any other movies by this director.
translation.hi_ng: mein is director ke baare mein kuch nahi suna hein

translation.en: Yes I think his frustrations are very relatable in many aspects of life
translation.hi_ng: haan. thoda frustrations hoon lekin is life mein kuch aspects relate bhi kar saktha

translation.en: I agree. I would feel the same way if I were constantly experiencing bad luck
translation.hi_ng: mein maantha hoon. muje bhi kuch aise hi feel huva, sabhi is bad luck ko experiencing karthe hein

translation.en: Would you want to play "God" for a week? What would you do?
translation.hi_ng: kya is week ko God movie play dekhna pasand karenge? ya aur kuch?

translation.en: I probably wouldn't, only because that would be a lot of responsibility to take care of everything in the entire world. But I would like to eliminate suffering in people. What about you?
translation.hi_ng: nahi yar, kyon ki muje aur koi kaam hein, kyon ki kaafi logon isse suffer hote hein. aapka kya haal chaal hein?

translation.en: Same here. I would probably end up like Bruce and end up saying yes to everyones prayers since it would be so overwhelming
translation.hi_ng: muje bhi.. mein tho bruce ke saath end up karunga kyon ki voh sabhi prayers ko suntha aur sabhi overwhelming ho jaathe

translation.en: Do you think that was the best way for him to answer prayers through email?
translation.hi_ng: kya is tarah ka prayers aap maanthe hon, jaise email mein prayer send karna?

translation.en: I agree. I think the email system was less personal than how God would actually answer prayers in reality. However, at that point I'm sure he was overwhelmed. How would you answer everyone's prayers if you had to be God?
translation.hi_ng: haan,... ab sabhi update hogaye tho kyon God bhi apne email system se kyon nahi chaleye... however, voh tho badi overwhelmed they.. kya voh saari prayers sunthe, jaise God ke tarah?

translation.en: Maybe through some type of app which is more modern now.  Do you think Bruce and Grace made a good couple?
translation.hi_ng: hosaktha, ab sabhi mordern tho hein... kuch app bhi ho saktha.. kya bruce aur grace vaakahi mein ache couple the?

translation.en: I think that the fact that they came back together and reconciled proves that they were always meant to be together.
translation.hi_ng: haan voh dono apne aapas ka pyar ko proves karthey they..

translation.en: What do you think he learned the most about being God for the week?
translation.hi_ng: aapko kya lagtha hein ki voh God se kya sikha hoga ?

translation.en: I think he learned about true happiness and how much people need prayers and responses by God. I think that he now understands that importance of not complaining.
translation.hi_ng: muje lagtha hein ki, voh true happiness kya  hota aur kaise peoples prayer karthe aur god kaise respond karteh.. ab usses sab understand hoga ..

translation.en: Hi
translation.hi_ng: namaste

translation.en: Hi there, what were you opinions?
translation.hi_ng: haay, kya raay thee?

translation.en: I have one great movie to recommend
translation.hi_ng: mere paas siphaarish karane ke lie ek behatareen film hai

translation.en: Lay it on me, buddy
translation.hi_ng: mujh par ise rakho dost

translation.en: Did you watch The Great Gatsby
translation.hi_ng: kya aapane The Great Gatsby dekha

translation.en: The adaptation starring Leonardo DiCaprio? I did indeed, it was enrapturing!
translation.hi_ng: Leonardo DiCaprio abhineet anukoolan mainne vaastav mein kiya tha

translation.en: It is based on novel from 1925
translation.hi_ng: yah 1925 ke upanyaas par aadhaarit hai

translation.en: Leonardo did some stunning acting
translation.hi_ng: liyonaardo ne kuchh shaanadaar abhinay kiya

translation.en: Written by F Scott Fitzgerald? Indeed, truly the great American novel
translation.hi_ng: F Scott Fitzgerald dvaara likhit? vaastav mein, vaastav mein mahaan amerikee upanyaas

translation.en: I think this movie was the best in 2013
translation.hi_ng: I think ki yah 2013 ki best movie hai

translation.en: great production and the vintage costumes were magnificent
translation.hi_ng: Great production aur vintage costume shandar the

translation.en: Without a doubt in my mind, Tobey Maguire as Nick Carraway was a casting masterstroke in my mind
translation.hi_ng: Mere mind mein beshak tobey maguire as nick carraway masterstroke tha

translation.en: The costume design definitely invoked the nouveau riche ideals which were central themes in the source material
translation.hi_ng: Isme jo central theme thi wo nouveau riche ideals se invoked costume design thi

translation.en: this movie entered the Classics
translation.hi_ng: Yah movie classic m enter kr gayi

translation.en: Not only that, but Baz Lurhmann's direction was a magnificent sight to behold
translation.hi_ng: Yahi nhi baz lurhmann ki shandaar direction ne bhi roke rakha

translation.en: Baz Luhrmann put a lot of drama and tension moments and combine it with romance
translation.hi_ng: Baz luhrmann ne khoob drama tension aur romance kiya

translation.en: Indeed, I also seem to remember the film picking up a wide amount of critical acclaim, and several award nominations for the efforts behind it
translation.hi_ng: Mein sochta hun ki is movie ko bahut critical acclaim aur award nomination milenge

translation.en: yes it was very strange that R.T gave only 48% rating
translation.hi_ng: Yah bahut hi strange hai ki R.T. ne sifr 48% hi rating di

translation.en: Perhaps, but I also seem to remember some of the more positive responses to the film, responses more in line with my own.
translation.hi_ng: Sayad par m sochta hun ki is movie ko aur positive milne chahiye mere hisab se

translation.en: And the budget was 190 mil. $

translation.en: I can definitely see where the money was placed, and for me it was all money well spent, as Baz Lurhmann seemed to have such a clear idea of the kind of film he wanted to craft.

translation.en: Great! I haven't actually seen that yet, but have been really wanting to. Which actors play Batman and Superman?
translation.hi_ng: Great, maine abhi tak wo dekhi nahi hai, but sahi me dekhna chahta hu. Batman aur Superman kaun actors bane hai?

translation.en: The actors are really great and you probably know all of them. Ben Affleck , Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, and Jesse Eisenberg to name a few.
translation.hi_ng: Actors sahi me acche hai aur tum probably sabhi ko jaante ho. Unme se kuch Ben Affleck , Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, and Jesse Eisenberg hai

translation.en: Ooh, that is excellent. I am looking forward to seeing Wonder Woman! Are Batman and Superman enemies at the start of the film?
translation.hi_ng: Oooh ye to excellent hai. Mujhe Wonder Woman dekhni hai. Kya film k start me Batman aur Superman dushman hai?

translation.en: Well lex luthor manipulates batman into a battle with Superman because he is obssessed with cloning superman.
translation.hi_ng: Well Lex Batman ko Superman se ladne me manipulate kar deta hai because wo superman ko clone kar ke liye obssessed hai.

translation.en: Oh! So Batman is supposed to bring Superman to Lex Luthor?
translation.hi_ng: Oh! To Batman Superman ko Lex Luthor k paas leke jata hai

translation.en: Really? The first time? That seems pretty amazing knowing that the characters have been around for so long! Very cool. Is the story set in Metropolis or Gotham?

translation.en: That is interesting, to have the film set in both cities. So Batman sees it as his duty somewhat to take Superman down?
translation.hi_ng: yeh tho interesting hei yar, is film tho dono cities ke hein. tho batman ko aasan padega us superman ka duty karne mein?

translation.en: Well the relationships of the characters are quite complex because Clark Kent A.K.A. Superman learns of Batman's justice methods and tries to expose him. All this happening while Lex luthor makes moves to get approval to obtain kryptonite from a senator.

translation.en: Not usually I like to be my own judge however if the reviews are overwhelmingly bad or good then it may influence whether or not I watch in theatres. I have to say for this movies though the reviews are quite mixed.

translation.en:
As a child, Bruce Wayne falls down into a dry well and is attacked by a swarm of bats,
subsequently developing a phobia of the creatures. While watching an opera with his
parents, Thomas and Martha, Bruce becomes frightened by performers masquerading as
bats and asks to leave. Outside, mugger Joe Chill murders Bruce's parents in front of him.
Orphaned, Bruce is raised by the family butler, Alfred Pennyworth.

translation.en:
Fourteen years later, Chill is freed in exchange for testifying against Gotham City mafia
boss Carmine Falcone. Bruce intends to murder Chill, but one of Falcone's assassins does
so first. Bruce's childhood friend, assistant district attorney Rachel Dawes, berates him for
attempting to undermine the justice system, saying that his father would be ashamed. Bruce
confronts Falcone, who tells him that real power comes from being feared. Bruce decides to
travel the world and learn how to confront injustice. While serving a prison sentence for theft
in Bhutan, he meets Henri Ducard, who trains him as a member of the League of Shadows,
led by Ra's al Ghul. After completing his training and purging his fears, Bruce learns that the
League intends to destroy Gotham, believing it to be corrupt, decadent, hypocritical and
beyond saving. Bruce rejects the League's cause and burns down their temple during his
escape. Ra's is killed by falling debris, while Bruce saves the unconscious
translation.hi_ng: 14 years ke pehele, chill ne exchange karne pe freed huva aur gotham city ke liye testifying kiya uska mafia boss carmine falcone ke saath.. bruce tho chill ko murder kiya aur uska falcone ka assassins ko pehle maara.. bruce ka childhood friend, assistant district attorney rachel dawes, ne usse berateskiya aur usse injustice de diya. aur unke father shame ho gaye.. bruce ne falcone ko confronts kiya aur unhone unka real powers ko faced kiya.. bruce ne world pura travel kiya aur kaafi sikh liya... lekinbhutan ko jab unhone prison gaye tho unhone henri ducard ko meet kiya aur unke paas member of league ka shadows ka train liya jo ra's al ghul ko led kar rahe they. training aur fear ko puging ko complete karne ke baath, bruce ne league ko sikh liya ki kaise gotham ko destroy kare.. ra's tho debris ko kill kiya, lekkin bruce ne usse unconsciously save kar diya

translation.en: I can only imagine the sarcastic jokes he makes in the film. Caine is perfect for that character.

translation.en: He has some gread monolouges

translation.en:
Batman intercepts a drug shipment, provides Rachel with evidence against Falcone, and
enlists Sergeant James Gordon, one of the few honest cops left in Gotham, to arrest him. In
prison, Falcone meets with Dr. Jonathan Crane, a corrupt psychiatrist whom he has helped
smuggle drugs into Gotham, and threatens to reveal his complicity if he does not declare

him mentally unfit for trial. Crane puts on a scarecrow mask and sprays Falcone with a fear-
inducing hallucinogen that drives him insane (which causes Falcone to constantly mouth the

word "Scarecrow"), and has him transferred to Arkham Asylum. While investigating "the
Scarecrow", Batman is exposed to the hallucinogen and left incapacitated. He is saved by
Alfred and given an antidote developed by Fox. When Rachel accuses Crane of corruption,
Crane reveals that he has been pouring his fear-inducing drug into Gotham's water supply.
He drugs Rachel with it, but Batman saves her and subdues Crane, who claims to work for
Ra's al Ghul. Batman evades the police to get Rachel to safety, administers the antidote,
and gives her a vial of it for Gordon and another for mass production. Ducard reappears at
Bruce's birthday party and reveals himself to be the true Ra's al Ghul. Having stolen a
powerful microwave emitter from Wayne Enterprises, he plans to vaporize Gotham's water
supply, rendering Crane's drug airborne and causing mass hysteria that will destroy the city.
He sets Wayne Manor aflame and leaves Bruce to die, but Alfred rescues him.
translation.hi_ng: Batman ne intercepts kiya us drug shipment ko, lekin rachel us evidence se falcone ko against kiya, aur sergeant james gordon ko enlists kiya, yek imandar cop tho us gowtham ko left kar de, arrest karne keliye. prison mein, falcone, Dr jonathan crane se mila, jo yek corrupt psychiatrist hein jo gotham ko drugs dene par help kiya aur use threatens bhi kiya us complicitiy ko reveal karne pe, agar voh mentally unfit hoga tho use declare nahi karega. crane ne tho us scarecrow mask pehena aur falcone ka dar ko sprays out kiya. voh hallucinogen tha kaafi insane huva fir us arkham asylum ko transferred bhi kiya.. jab scarecrow ko investigating kar rahe the, tab batman ne us hallucinogen ko exposed kiya aur incapacitated ko left kiya. voh alfred ko save kiya aur usse fox ka antidote developed de deya.. jab rachel ko crane ka correptionko accusses kiya gaya, tab crane ne reveal kiya ki usse drug se dar hein aur voh gowtham ka water supply tha.. voh rachel ko drugs addit kiya lekin batman ne usse save kara aur crane ko subdues kiya jo ra ke liye voh work kar raha tha. batmen ne police ko evades kiya aur rachel ko safety kara, Ducard ne fir us bruce ka birthday party par aaya aur voh raa ka ham se reveals kar de. voh yek powerful microwave chura liya us wayne enterprises ke saath. aur usne gotham ka water supply ko vaporize karne ka plan kara, aur city ko destroy karne par tula huva tha. lekin wayne manor ne aflame kiya aur bruce ko maar daala, lekin alfred ne recuses ki leiya

translation.en: In general this movie began in 1990 with Universal Pictures, Paramount Pictures, and New Line Cinema before Marvel Studios reacquired the rights in 2005.
translation.hi_ng: SAMANYA TAUR PAR YAH MOVIE 1990 MEIN UNIVERSAL PICTURES, PARAMOUNT PICTURES, AND NEW LINE CINEMA KE SAATH  SHUROO HUI JISKE BAADH MARVEL STUDIOS 2005 MEIN RIGHTS KO PHIR SE HASSIL KI.

translation.en: interesting why in such films bad people are killed at the end... :)
translation.hi_ng: INTERESTING HAI KI AISEE FILMON MEIN BUREY LOGON KO AAKHIR MEIN KYON MAARA JAATA HAIN..:)

translation.hi_ng: aur stane apni armor se gir jaatha us reactor ko explod karne samayh

translation.en: maybe
translation.hi_ng: jarur

translation.en: all full
translation.hi_ng: ah sabhi

translation.en: Marvel put the project into production as its first self-financed film, with 20th Century Fox as its distributor.
translation.hi_ng: marvel ne tho is project ka production pehla self financed film me daala, jo 20th century fox ki distributor tha

translation.en: thank you for conversation...
translation.hi_ng: thank you aapse conversation karne se

translation.en: bye
translation.hi_ng: bye

translation.en: than to you
translation.hi_ng: aapko bhi

translation.en: The Inception was given a Rotten Tomatoes rating of 86%.
translation.hi_ng: The Inception ko 86% ka Rotten Tomatoes rating given he.

translation.en: I see Leonardo DiCaprio starred in it as well as Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page and Tom Hardy.
translation.hi_ng: me dekha  Leonardo DiCaprio isme starred he as well as Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page aur Tom Hardy.

translation.en: 86% is a fair rating.  I felt that this movie was excellent but somewhat 'heady'.  I could see why it isn't everyone's cup of tea.  What rating would you give Inception?
translation.hi_ng: 86% fair rating he. Mujhe laga ki ye movie excellent he but somewhat "heady" he.me dekh sakta hu ki kyu ye everyone ka cup of tea he.Tum Inception ko kya rating dete?

translation.en: I agree. 86% seems fair.
translation.hi_ng: me agree hu. 86% fair lagti he.

translation.en: There were some interesting characters in this movie. What character did you relate to most?
translation.hi_ng: Is movie me kuch interesting character the.Kis character se tum sabse adhik relate karte ho?

translation.en: Leonardo DiCaprio was compelling in the role of Dom.  The Inception seems like a tailor fit role for DiCaprio.  I enjoyed his performance but found that the plot was so inventive that I had a hard time relating directly to any of the characters.  It seemed too divorced from reality.
translation.hi_ng: Leonardo DiCaprio, Dom ke role me Compelling tha.The Inception ka role lagta he ki DiCaprio ke liye tailor fit role tha.mene uska performance enjoy kiya but  mujhe laga ki role itna inventive tha ki kis bhi character se directly  relate karna mere liye  hard he.

translation.en: Did this movie make you ponder the origins of your own thoughts?
translation.hi_ng: Kya is movie ne tumhe tumhari soch ke baare mein sochne pe majboor kiya?

translation.en: Well, it was interesting, to say the least. The idea of planting something into another persons subconscious made me think for sure.
translation.hi_ng: Well, kam bolna interesting tha. Kisi dusre ke subconscious mein kuch plant karne ke idea nei mujhe sure kar diya.

translation.en: It was pretty "out there".
translation.hi_ng: Bahar bahut sunder h.

translation.en: Do you like scientific movies?
translation.hi_ng: Kya tumhe scientific movies h?

translation.en: I adore them.  The more "out there" the better.
translation.hi_ng: I unse pyar h. Bahar bahut better h.

translation.en: Did you notice the complexity of the dreamscapes in the movie? I thought it was very inventive.
translation.hi_ng: kya tumne movie mein dreamscapes ki complexity ko notice kiya? Mujhe laga yaha bahut inventive h.

translation.en: I'm having a hard time recalling some of the specifics.  It's hard to believe this film is almost 10 years old already!  I do recall them growing increasingly more complex and dream like the deeper they went though.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe kuch specific yaad nai aa rahi h. yaha believe karna mushkil h ki yaha movie 10 saal purani h! Mujhe yaad aa raha h ki yaha din b din complex and dream like ho rhi h.

translation.en: Did you notice in each dream there was a "kick"?
translation.hi_ng: kya tune notice kiya ki har ek dream mein ek kick h

translation.en: I did, I loved it!  It was like a dreamy Rube Goldberg contraption.
translation.hi_ng: Maine kiya, yaha mujhe pasand h! Yaha dremy Rube Goldberg contraption ki tarah h.

translation.en: Can you imagine yourself in a similar scenario?  They must have had a tremendous amount of trust for each other.  If anything went wrong they could have ended up in 'limbo'.
translation.hi_ng: kya tum apne aap ko same scenario mein imagine kar sakte ho? Unme bahut jyada trust hona chahiye. Yadi kuch bhi wrong hota h to wo limlbe mein khatm ho sakta h

translation.en: I couldn't imagine it. Sounds very risky. Especially if the dreamer dies in the dream before the sedative wears off.
translation.hi_ng: mein imagine bhi nahi saktha. voh toh badi risky sound kartha. expecially voh dreamer apna dream mein hi mar jaatha uska sedative wear karne ke pehle hi

translation.en: If the dreamer died and you end up in 'limbo', where do you think that is?  All of the extractors are living within that consciousness, what would become of them?  (since if he dies, that consciousness will cease to exist.)
translation.hi_ng: agar dreamer mar gaya toh limbo mein end hotha. kaise aise kar sakthe? sabhi extractors issi consciousness mein hi jee rahe hein. kya yeb sab ban baayenge?

translation.en:
Good question, and very thought provoking. In the movie they just went into limbo but I suppose the subconscious dreams would have to adjust to fit the new scenario. It would be scary to have the possibility of forgetting that you are in a dream at all. Do you think it would be worth
 the potential setback?
translation.hi_ng: ache question kaafi provoking thought hein. is movie mein voh limbo ke liye gaye hein kyon ki mein subconscious dream par is scenario ko nahi mil paatha. bahut scary dream hein. kya aap ko is potential setback ke baare mein kya haal chaal hein

translation.en: I think that possibility is much greater than a setback.  I took it to mean that all the extractors as well as the subject would be trapped forever.  In that way it seems much too risky.  The aim is to plant an idea in someones mind without their realizing it, almost like mind control.  I think it would me much easier, and less risky, to sit and negotiate with someone.  Although, that's not at all subversive.
translation.hi_ng: muje lagtha hein ki is setback thoda jyada hein. muje lagtha hein ki sabhi extractors ko is subject ko trapped kiye gaye hein. is tarah mein toh yeh jyada risky nazar aa raha hein. uska aim ka plant toh koi dusri ka idea hoga jo koi mind control kiya hein. mein soch raha hun ki voh jyada easier ho tha aur risky bhi kam hota aur negotiate bhi kar sakthe. magar sab koi subversive nahi hote

translation.en: Good point. What did you think about what happened to Mal?
translation.hi_ng: ache point hein. toh aap us mal ko kya huva?

translation.en: Mal's conflict is pivotal to this film.  For all the layers of intrigue we have diving down into the dreams of the target, Mal's actions plant the idea in our minds that there could be many layers above as well.  Is the reality we began this film in reality at all?  What do you think?
translation.hi_ng: mal ka conflick is film mein pivotal hein. toh sabhi intrigue ko is dream ka target diving hota hein, Mals ka action plant ka idea toh badi layers hein.. reality mein toh is film thoda jyada hi reality ho gaya. kya aap kya sochte hein?

translation.en: Reality as we know it can be hard. If there was an alternate reality available that was more enjoyable I could see where Mal would want to believe it was the "real" reality. The dreams would have to be extremely detailed and believable to be that convinced. Since Mal committed suicide to attempt to "wake up" for real, I assume the beginning reality was the "real" one. Do you think Cobb should face murder charges for Mal's death?
translation.hi_ng: hakikath mein toh jeena thoda kasth hein. agar koi alternate reality hein toh maja aatha, muje toh us mal ko reality mein believe hi nahi hota. uska dream toh badi detailed aur believable thi ki koi convinced ho saktha. agar mal suicide karne ka dream aatha jab utne se, toh mein reality par believe karte. kya cobb ko, mals ka murder charges lagane ka faisla thik tha?

translation.en: Absolutely not, the audience knows the real truth.
translation.hi_ng: bilkul nahi yar, audience ko sach patha hota hei

translation.en: I tend to agree.
translation.hi_ng: mein bhi agree karunga

translation.en: It's a good thing Ariadne had the kick setup for Fischer to wake up.
translation.hi_ng: yeh sabhi baath hein ki ariadne ko us fisher ne acha kick setup kiya jab wake up hote par

translation.en: It is a good thing they didn't get trapped.  Memories of a dying parent would be very strong.  Would a new memory like this make you change your life?
translation.hi_ng: yeh acchi baat hai ki pakde nahi gaye. marte huye parents ki memories bohot strong hoti hai. kya aise ek nayi memory tumhe apni life change karne par majbor karegi?

translation.en: I think it would. I would want to honor my dying parents requests. How about you?
translation.hi_ng: mujhe lagta hai ha. mai apne marte huye parents ki iccha zarur puri karunga. tum?

translation.en: I would too.  Would you stay in a dream forever if it were the reality you loved?
translation.hi_ng: mai bhi. kya tum humesha k liye ek dream me rahoge agar tumhe reality pasand ho?

translation.en: It would certainly be tempting! How odd would it be to know you are in a dream yet you are getting older, living a whole life? Waking up, you'd be much younger then in the dream. Do you think that would make it more difficult to believe that it is the actual reality?
translation.hi_ng: bohot tempting hoga wo. tumhe kaisa lagega yeh jaan k ki bhale hi tum ek dream me ho par phir bhi tum age kar rahe aur ek life ji rahe? jab jagoge toh tum bohot young hoge dream me. tumhe lagta hai yeh yakeen karna mushkil hoga, actual reality?

translation.en: Well, it depends.  I'm growing older right now but I believe this is reality.  I'd certainly be happy to die, but then wake up a younger man!  But I have no difficulty believing this is reality because I don't know any better right now.  If I did know this was a dream I'd be happy to stay here because I'd get to live a whole extra life before my next.  What would you do?
translation.hi_ng: waise, it depends. mai abhi budha ho raha aur mujhe lagta hai yeh reality hai. mujhe waise yeh sahi me accha lagega agar mai maru aur phir se zinda jab hou tab young ho jau! waise mujhe yeh manne me koi pareshaani nahi ki yeh sacchai hai kuiki mujhe isse better kuch pata nahi hai. agar yeh ek sapna hai toh mai yaha rehna chachunga kyuki jab mai jagunga toh mujhe ek extra life jeene ko milegi. tum kya sochate ho?

translation.en: Honestly, I'm not sure but I think it would make my mind play trick on me. "Wait, I just lived my life. How can I now be in a different one?" It would definitely hard to grasp.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe pata nahi, par mujhe yeh zarur lagta hai ki mera mind itna bada dhokha nahi karega mere saath. "maine ek jeevan jiya. ek aur kaise ji sakta mai?" bohot pareshaani hogi yakeen karne me

translation.en: What did you think of the spinning top totem?
translation.hi_ng: tum kya sochate ho spinning top totem k baare me?

translation.en: I thought it was the perfect cinematic device.  The spinning creates so much anticipation for what comes next.  Will it fall over, won't it?  Puts you on the edge of your seat.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe lagta hai wo ek perfect cinematic device hai. jo spinning hai wo itna excitement create karti ki ab next kya hoga. kya hoga agar sab bigad gaya? bohot hi zyada thrill.

translation.en: What kind of totem do you think you would have?
translation.hi_ng: tum kis type ka totem pasand karoge?

translation.en: I think an eight ball would be exciting and create anticipation.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe lagta hai eight ball accha hoga aur anticipation create karega

There are quite a few key scenes throughout the movie that are relevant

translation.en:
You should try to discuss the new paragraph when the document has changed.
You will have 3 turns of conversation with your partner on each of the documents.
You will be given 4 documents each containing a short paragraph. The new paragraph might show just beneath the previous document.
The next document will be loaded automatically after you finish 3 turns discussing the current document.
You cannot use information you personally know that is not included there. You can use any information given in the document in the conversation.

translation.en: The movie is a scientific movie about people who infiltrate the subconscious of individuals and obtain information in the dream world. Basically they enter into someone's dreams to find out information.
translation.hi_ng: Ye movie ek scientific movie hai, un logo ke baar me jo logo ke subconscious mind me infiltrate karte hai aur unke sapno ki duniya se information jutate hai. Basically wo kisi ke sapno me jaakar information nikalte hai.

translation.en:
So there's this scene where multiple people are going into a dream. So they need to have someone "kick" them awake at the same time to escape. However, someone gets wounded in the dream
 and are almost dying and they get sent into "limbo".
translation.hi_ng: scene me bahut sare aadmi swapn me kho jaath hai .koi unko jagane aur bachane ki zaroorat hai. par koi log swapn me ghaayal ho gaye aur marnevale the aur  "limbo" ho jaathe hai.

translation.en: and what happens if the die in the dream? what are the consequences of this
translation.hi_ng: kya hoga agar woh swapn me mar jaathe hai tho? uska natheeja kya hoga

translation.en: They basically are stuck there until someone can wake them up in the real world. So in the movie, even though it was only a few hours of real time, two of the characters spent fifty years in the "limbo" world, where they had to construct it based on their shared memories.
translation.hi_ng: woh fass jaathe hai, jab tak unhe koi nai jaga tha aur duniya me le aatha.is movie me bale asli duniya kuch ghante ke liye hai ,par do character pachas saal "limbo" duniya me tha, gayee yaadon par banan pada.

translation.en: And whats the role of Leonardo Di Caprio in this film?
translation.hi_ng: Leonardo Di Caprio ka is film me kya role hai?

translation.en: Im guessing he has the leading role
translation.hi_ng: mujhe lagtha hai achhi role hai.

translation.en: Yeah he's the lead actor. His name is Dom Cobb and he specializes in conning secrets from victims in their dreams.
translation.hi_ng: Haan woh lead actor hai. Uska naam hai Dom Cobb aur uska specialization hai conning secrets from victims unke dreams mein.

translation.en: One more thing about the "limbo" world is that eventually people forget that the world they are in is not real.
translation.hi_ng: "limbo" world ke baare mein ek aur cheez hai ki eventually log bhool jaate hain ki jis duniye mein wo hain wo real nahi hai.

translation.en: So they can't distinguish between a dream and what is real.
translation.hi_ng: To wo dream aur real ke beech mein distinguish nahi kar sakte.

translation.en: Even when they "wake up" in a dream, they are still in the dream even if they don't realize it.
translation.hi_ng: Even agar woh dream mein "wake up" bhi ho jaate hain to bhi  wo dream mein hi hote hain even if they don't realize it.

translation.en: Seems like a really interesting concept
translation.hi_ng: really interesting concept  lagta hai

translation.en: Hello! Isn't Monsters University a great movie? It was true to the spirit of Monsters, Inc. and matched its tone.
translation.hi_ng: hello... monsters university kya acha movie hien? kya vaakahi mein spirit of monsters sach hein, aur unka tone matched hein

translation.en: I agree.  It was a good movie
translation.hi_ng: mein maantha hoon.. badiya movie hein

translation.en: What was your favorite part?
translation.hi_ng: favorite part konsa hein?

translation.en: I liked when Mike and Sully didn't finish the program and worked their way up the ranks anyways.
translation.hi_ng: jab mike aur sully apne program finish nahi hote aur unhone saath ranks karne ke work kar rahe the, us scene ko muje pasand hein

translation.en: Me too! It was very inspiring and showed that you can accomplish your dreams many ways. I liked how the movie expanded on the monster world.
translation.hi_ng: muje bhi! kitna inspiring hein yar, isse patha chaltha hein ki hum kaise apne dreams ko accomplish karthe jo jarur sach hoga... muje tho is movie ka monster world expanded bahut pasand hein

translation.en: Yes.  The first movie only gave one facet of the world, while the second developed the setting to a much larger degree.
translation.hi_ng: haan.. first movie ne yek facet world diya hein, second tho larger degree ko diya hein

translation.en: When I heard they were making another Monsters Inc movie I expected a sequel, not a prequel. But I ended up loving it! Did you see it in theatres?
translation.hi_ng: agar voh dusra monsters inc banaye tho jarur sequel he expect karenge pequel nahi,.. lekin end tho badiya hein.. aap theatres mein dekhe kya?

translation.en: I don't think we saw it in the theatre.  I think we rented it.  It's been a while though.  I should show it to my kids.  They would probably like it.
translation.hi_ng: theatre mein tho dekha yaad nahi hein... muje lagtha hum rented... bachon ko jarur dekhavunga..

translation.en: I bet they would! I don't have kids but my coworkers do. I love Disney/Pixar movies so I recommend them to my coworkers a lot.
translation.hi_ng: jarur, mera pas kid nahi hei, lekin mere coworkers ke paas hein... muje disney pixar movies pasand hein, isliye mein apne coworkers ko jarur recommend karunga

translation.en: I really enjoy Randy Newman's music on this, the Toy Story movies, and Finding Nemo/Dory.
translation.hi_ng: randy newmans ka  music ko enjoy karunga, the toy story movies aur finding nemo/ dory

translation.en: Me too! I think the Toy Story movies might be my favorite Pixar movies. Did you hear that they're building a Toy Story Land in Walt Disney World this summer?
translation.hi_ng: me bhi! toy story movies from pixar mere favorite movies hai.tereko pata hai kya wo log toy story land bana rahe hai walt disny world mai ye summer mai.

translation.en: I did hear that.  It sounds pretty interesting.
translation.hi_ng: ha suna maine, acha hoga shayad

translation.en: I'm going to WDW in the fall so I'm excited to see how the park is. Have you ever been? Or to Disneyland?
translation.hi_ng: mai wdw ja raha hy, bahor excitement hai park dekhne ki, tu kabhi gaya hai ya disneyland ko ?

translation.en: I've been to WDW a few times.  Never to Disneyland though.  California is pretty far away from me.  We went camping at WDW last year though.  It was great.
translation.hi_ng: ha wdw ko kuch bar gaya hu, disney land ko nahi gaya. california dur hai mujhse.hum camping krne gaye the wdw pichle sal. maja aaya tha.

translation.en: That's what I'm doing in the fall! I'm really looking forward to camping there!
translation.hi_ng: wahi mai karne wala hu  ye fall mai,rah dekh raha hu camping krne ki

translation.en: It was really great.  We camped for four nights I think.  It rained like crazy the first day, but it was still fun.
translation.hi_ng: bahot mast hai. humne char rat camoing kiya, pehle din bahot barish giri,but maja aaya.

translation.en: Do you like Mike or Sulley better?
translation.hi_ng: tuzhe mike ya sulle mai se kon pasand hai jyada

translation.en: Oh good question! I think I like Mike more. He's weirdly optimistic.
translation.hi_ng: acha sawal hai, mujhe mike jyada acha lagta hai. wo alag hi optimistic hai.

translation.en: How about you?
translation.hi_ng: tuzhe kya lagta hai

translation.en: I like Mike because he's funnier.  He had some of the best lines in the first movie.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe mike pasand hai kyu ki wo bahot funny hai. usme kuch behterin lines hai movie ke.

translation.en: He is SO funny!!
translation.hi_ng: voh funny hein

translation.en: I always liked John Goodman's voice acting for Sully, though. It's perfect for a big, fluffy monster
translation.hi_ng: muje tho hamesha goodman ka voice pasand hein, big aur fluffy monster ke liye tho perfect hein

translation.en: The part at the end of the first movie when he burps out the microphone makes my kids laugh so hard.
translation.hi_ng: first movie ka end tho is part mein hein, jab voh microphone mein burps out kiya tho mera kids jor se has rahe they

translation.en: I agree. John Goodman was a great choice for Sulley.

translation.en: Hahah I bet!!!

translation.en: I love the scare machine they had in the prequel that the students had to frighten for the contest. That was pretty neat

translation.en: Yeah, though I was really disappointed with Sulley for cheating.
translation.hi_ng: haan, sulley ka cheating se kuch disappoint hein

translation.en: I was too, that broke my heart. I cried when that happened!

translation.en: It was really a cruel thing for him to do to MIke
translation.hi_ng: yeh tho sach mein cruel thing hein mike keliye

translation.en: It seemed a little out of character for Sulley, but I guess they had to have some final source of conflict between the two to keep the plot moving.
translation.hi_ng: sulley keliye tho yeh little out character hein, lekin conflict ke liye tho unke paas final source jarur hoga,

translation.en: I agree, it was probably my least favorite part of the movie. I feel like they could have taken the story in a different direction.
translation.hi_ng: mein maantha hoon, yeh probably mera least favorite part hein is movie mien.. muje lagtha hein ki yeh story kuch different direction mein ja raha hein

translation.en: For Sully to trick Mike into thinking he was scary was just so hurtful!
translation.hi_ng: sully ko mike ko trick karne ko soch de tho voh dar gaya, kitna hurtful hein

translation.en: I do like that they ended up working so hard to achieve their dreams though.  That's a good message that Disney started doing with the Princess and the Frog.
translation.hi_ng: muje us ending bahut pasand hein, jo apne dream achieve karne ke liye itna hard se work kiya.. ache message hein,disney ka... disney tho princess and the frog se start kiya aise message dene

translation.en: Me too! I like that common thread between the two movies. I think it was executed better in this though, because they really did start from the very bottom of Monsters, Inch
translation.hi_ng: muje bhi in dono movies ka common thread pasand hein... muje lagtha yeh thoda better se executed kiya hein, kyon ki bottom of monster se start kiya

translation.en: And it explains why they're always nice to the other nerdy janitors in the original movie.  They were once in that same position.
translation.hi_ng: aur in mein explain kiya ki kaise voh janitors ka original moives se ache hein... same position mein tho hein voh

translation.en: Oh my gosh!!! I didn't even realize that! I have to rewatch the movie. You're totally right!
translation.hi_ng: omg! muje realize hi nahi huva! mein is movie ko dubara dekhna pasand karunga.. aap bilkul sahi hein

translation.en: It does show a really good message for kids, to be respectful of everybody
translation.hi_ng: isme kids keliye ache message hein, jo respectful hein sabhi keliye

translation.en: It's a valuable message.  Be kind and respectful to everyone.  Don't expect to lean on your credentials or family reputation to get you somewhere in life.  Just be prepared to work your hardest.
translation.hi_ng: in mein, valuable message hein, sabhi ke saath kind aur respectful hona.. apni credentials aur family reputation ke liye kabhi life mein lean mat hona.. sirf prepare se ho

translation.en: Yes! I liked that they showed Sully as this spoiled brat at first who eventually learned that you can't always lean on your family's reputation. It can only get you so far
translation.hi_ng: haan! muje bhi sully ka spoiled brat pehela pasand hein, jo apni family reputation ke liye kabhi lean nahi hota..

translation.en: Maybe his spoiled background is why he cheated in the competition, because he didn't really realize the consequences of his actions, just did what he thought was right
translation.hi_ng: lekin uska background thoda spoiled hein, kyon ki voh competition mein cheat kiy.. lekin unka action ka consequences nahi realize huva, bas kya use right laga voh kar baita

translation.en: I feel like a lot of kids need that message these days.
translation.hi_ng: I feel aajkal bahut se kids ko is meesage ki bahut jarurat hai.

translation.en: You've got a good point there about the cheating.
translation.hi_ng: tumhare pass bahut badhiya point hai cheating ke baare men.

translation.en: And you have a good point there about kids needing that message!
translation.hi_ng: aur aapke pass yah badhiya point hai is message ka kids ki jaruraton ke baare me.

translation.en: I like that they had to work hard together too, so it didn't feel like so much of a struggle. Because Mike and Sully had each other to share in that struggle of working their way up the corporate ladder
translation.hi_ng: maine ye baat like ki ki unko sath milke hard work karna pada, so aisa feel nahi aaya ki ye koi jyada struggle tha. Because Mike and Sully ko ek dusre ke sath the unka struggle share karne me jab wo corporate  ladder chadh rahe the.

roadway musical

translation.en: Do you like comedies like this, or are you more into dramas?

translation.en: My favorite movie genre is science fiction, but I do like a good comedy, or a good drama. If it's a good movie, I really don't care what genre it is.

translation.en: That's true. The first review under the "critical response" section is pretty harsh. I'm not sure I really ever read or care about movie reviews, just the ratings % online

translation.en: Yes, I can I didn't get that impression.

translation.en: Yes, he is pretty good in everything he does.

translation.en: Who is Alan Turing?

translation.en: true. Metacritic gave them 73/100. Turing was a mathematician who was a cryptanalyst for the British during WWII against the Germans. He is famous for breaking the Enigma code.
translation.hi_ng: sach hein yar, metacritic ne 73/100 diya tha. Turing toh mathematician hein jo british ke liye cryptanalyst  bane the tab wwii saari germans ke against the. aur voh enigma code ko break karne mein famous hein.

translation.en: He was outed as a spy by the police who were investigating a break in at his home.

translation.en: It is kind of technical. It goes pretty in depth about his machine to break the code. He has some breakthroughs when he realizes he can program it with words he already knows. You will probably enjoy that.

translation.en: It is interesting since the movie is based on a play based on a book based on his life. I see your point there.

translation.en: I would probably enjoy the technical aspects of the film, the good acting, and even the half made up story!
translation.hi_ng: mai probably film ke technical aspect ko enjoy karu, badhiya acting, aur half cooked story.

translation.en: I think also where it is a movie about a mathematician, it kind of helps to add in some plot elements. I think this is unusual though as his life was so interesting.

translation.en: Well let see, It came out in 2010 and was produced by Dreamworks, it is a fully animated show.

translation.hi_ng: Dreamworks huh? main unke bahut movies enjoy karta hoon. I assume from the title ke iska dragons se kuch lena hai

translation.en: It is set back in the Viking Days, and it has a teenage character named Hiccup, who finds a wounded dragon and befiends it.
translation.hi_ng: ye  Viking Days mein set hai, aur isme ek teenage character  ka naam Hiccup hai,jisko zakhmi dragon milta hai aur dosti karta hai

translation.hi_ng: hum dosthen hei

translation.en: Oh the old boy and his dog story but with a dragon huh? That sounds pretty interesting. Was it received pretty well?

translation.en: The movie is a bit unique as it uses 3D animation , its a coming of age comedy, the same producers of Lilo and Stitch created it.
translation.hi_ng: is movie tho 3D animation ka hein aur voh unique se hei. yeh age comedy ka aur same producers yaani Lilo aur stitch ka created hey

translation.en: It seemed to do ok it got a 98% on rotten tomatoes, but an A in Cinema score
translation.hi_ng: acha tho 98% Rotten tomatoes neh deya tha lekin yeh tho A nikla

translation.en:
I see! That sounds pretty good then.
 You said it was animated but do you know who provides the voices?
translation.hi_ng: acha! tho yeh kaafi acha rahega. aap animated bole lekin kon uska voice deya?

translation.en: Actually some well known names come to mind, like hiccup is played by Jay Baruchel. And Gerard Butler as the chief Viking, America Ferrera plays a friend of Hiccup. Hiccup is the main character of course.
translation.hi_ng: actually kuch jaan pehechan ka naam mera mind mei aa raha hei yaani hiccup ka role tho Jay baruchel ne kiya aur gerard butler ka role chief viking aur america ferrere ka role tho hiccup ka friend ne kiya actually Hiccup tho main character hein

translation.en: That's really cool. I'm sure they do a great job. I really like animated movies so I might have to check that one out sometime.
translation.hi_ng: oh tho acha rehega. muje animated movies dekhna pasand hein mein kuch movies aisa dekha hoon

translation.en: I have actually seen it and I would recommend it
translation.hi_ng: mein tho dekh chuka hoon aur mein is movie ko recommend karunga

translation.en: You mentioned that he befriends a dragon. Can you tell me anything more about that?
translation.hi_ng: jaise aap kahe vaise uska friend hi dragon hein, kya aur kuch uska baare mein aap batha sakthe ho?

translation.en: Sure, the Dragons name is Night fury. And the movie doesn't have much of a storyline, but it has battles between tamed and evil ones.
translation.hi_ng: jarur, Dragon ka naam hein Night fury, aur us movie mein kafi storyline nahi hein lakin uska tamed aur evil one ka battles chal raha hein.

translation.en: Do youlike dragons?
translation.hi_ng: kya tumhe dragons pasand hai?

translation.en: I see, that sounds pretty interesting though. I do! Dragons are usually the bad guys in a film so it might be cool to get a film with a good one
translation.hi_ng: I see, kaafi interesting sound karta hai. Mujhe pasand hai. Dragons usually bad guys rahte hai movies me to kisi film agar wo acche hai to kaafi cool baat hai

translation.en: And vikings as well. It sounds like a very unique setting.
translation.hi_ng: Aur vikings bhi hai. Kaafi unique setting hai

translation.en: YES, The isle of Berk is their village, and they are afraid of the dragons because they steal their livestock, so when they come upon the dragons they usually kill them.
translation.hi_ng: Haan, isle of Berk unka village hai aur wo dragons se darte hai kyuki wo unke livestock chura lete hai, to jab wo aate hai usually unko maar dete hai.

translation.en: Oh no! But I guess Hiccup finds out that not all dragons are bad in the end?
translation.hi_ng: Oh nahi! But I guess Hiccup ko pata chalega sab dragons bure nahi hote.

translation.en: See Hiccup is scrawny and cant fight because he is scrawny, so he makes things, apparatuses if you will.
translation.hi_ng: See Hiccup bahut scrawny hai aur isliye fight nahi kar sakta, to wo cheeze banata hai, apparatus bol sakte ho

translation.en: but he isnt very good at it
translation.hi_ng: but wo bahut accha nahi hai isme

translation.en: I see, an awkward kid makes a friend of a dragon huh? That does sound very interesting.
translation.hi_ng: I see , ek awkward kid dragon ko dost bana leta hai. sahi me interesting sound karta hai

translation.en: I usually like animated films that have a good main character so this might be right up my alley.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe usually animated movies jisme accha main character ho pasand aati hai, to bilkul mere type ki movie hai

translation.en: SO during one of those attacks Hiccup shoots at a dragon, and believes he has shot it down. Finds it later, not dead, but damaged. Helpes the dragon fly again then finds out that thedragonsare being Bullied by a bigger one.
translation.hi_ng: To aise hi attacks k duaran Hiccup ek dragon ko shoot karta hai aur maanta hai k usne maar diya. Baad me pata chalta hai k maara nahi but damage kiya hai. Wo us dragon ko wapas udne me help karta hai aur pata lagata hai k sabhi dragons ko ek bada dragon bully kar raha hai.

translation.en: I see! I bet he works together with his new dragon friend to help them out then.
translation.hi_ng: I see! Mai sart lagata hu, ki  wo apne naye gragon mitra ko madad karne ke liye, milkar kam karenge.

translation.en: So Hiccup and his friends decide they are going to help out Hiccups friendly Dragon and they all learn how to train awkward dragons and go off to fight the biggest Dragon which they call Red Death.
translation.hi_ng: Isliye Hiccup aur uske friends ne decide kiya ki wo biggest Dragon ki jisko Red Death kaha jata hai unse ladai ke liye, wo Hiccups friendly Dragon ko madad karenge aur wo log sikhenge ki awkward dragons ko kaise train kiya jaye.

translation.en: That does sound cool!
translation.hi_ng: wo cool sunai padta hai!

translation.en: And it looks like we're done
translation.hi_ng: aur wo pura kiya dikh raha hai

translation.en: It's been nice talking with you!
translation.hi_ng: Apke sath bath karna achha laga

translation.en: Have a good day.
translation.hi_ng: Apka din subh rahe

translation.en: Yeah - I wanted to talk about it because I like how David Fincher directed it.
translation.hi_ng: Yeah - me uske baare me baat karna chahta hun, jaise David Fincher ne ise direct kiya mujhe pasand aaya.

translation.en: ok
translation.hi_ng: Ok

translation.en: Did you see it?

translation.en: yes i did
translation.hi_ng: haan yar

translation.en: Yeah, a lot. Sorkin and Fincher sure laced their scathing wit with an aching sadness, you know? I guess everybody says that, though.
translation.hi_ng: bahut yar.. sorkin aur fincher tho apni aching sadness ko tho badiya scathing kare.. aapko patha hein? i guess ki sabhi aise hi sochthe honge..

translation.en: ok, i wasnt aware it was based on a book
translation.hi_ng: ok, muje iska koi aware nahi hein.. lekin yeh book ke based hoga

translation.en: Yeah. Though I guess the movie isn't quite as factual as the book? And that the book is pretty heavily debated.
translation.hi_ng: haan.. book se compare kare tho yeh movie itna bhi ache nahi hein kyon? aur book tho heavily debated tha

translation.en: I see
translation.hi_ng: acha

translation.en: You remember that bit where Zuckerberg gets dumped and then writes a mean post about his ex?
translation.hi_ng: aapko yaad hein ki zuckerberg tho kuch samai dumped tha aur voh apne ex se badi mean tha

translation.en: Im not a fan of facebook or zukerbeg, but I thought the movie was well done.   I dont remember that part specifically
translation.hi_ng: mein zukerberg ka fan nahi hoon, lekin movie tho badiya nikla.. muje uska yaad kuch nahi aatha

translation.en: Yeah, no, I'm no fan of either, either. But it was that scene that kind said everything that needed to be said about the mentality behind that site. I thought that was pretty brilliant.
translation.hi_ng: haan yar, mein bhi uska fan nahi hoon.. lekin is scene mein tho kuch aise dekhaya gaya hein ki voh usse mentaly lead kar raha hein.. voh tho brilliant hein.

translation.en: it seems to be highly rated
translation.hi_ng: ye kafi high rated dikhti hai

translation.en: Yeah. It's definitely a strong movie. I mean, it's a movie about Facebook that is actually watchable. That's saying something.
translation.hi_ng: Han. ye definitely ek strong movie hai. Mera matlab, ye facebook par aisi movie hai jo watchable hai. Bahut badi baat hai.

translation.en: yes Iwas thinking that as well
translation.hi_ng: han main bhi yahi soch raha tha.

translation.en: it is even more trajic where it has brought us politically
translation.hi_ng: ye aur bhi tragic hai ki ye hume politically kahan le aya

translation.en: For sure. And I feel like it's all in that bit where Sean Parker has his line about "You know what IS cool? A billion dollars." Like, it's presented as a way to keep people in touch, but it's really the coldest corporate-type of thing.
translation.hi_ng: sach mein. Aur mujhe lagta hai ye sab usme bit mein hai jahan Sean Parker ki line hai "You know what IS cool? A billion dollars.". Like, ye aise way mein presented hai ki people touch mein rahein, par ye really bohat cold-corporate type ki thing hai

translation.en: yes greed is powerfull
translation.hi_ng: han greed powerful hai

translation.en: Did you know Sean Parker was the founder of Napster?
translation.hi_ng: kya tum jante ho Sean Parker Napster ka founder tha

translation.en: yes
translation.hi_ng: yes

translation.en: it is interesting how he suggested getting rid of "the"
translation.hi_ng: ye interesting hai kaise usne 'the' se rid karne ka suggest.

translation.en:
Yes! I was just about to say that. 
I think it's crazy how much influence he had on Facebook when it started out.
translation.hi_ng: han! main wahi bolne wala tha. Mujhe lagta hai ye crazy hai uske pas kitna zyada influence tha jab facebook start hua.

translation.en: Then there's that last scene, where Zuckerberg keeps refreshing his page to see if his ex-girlfriend has accepted his friend request. That's what it all comes back to. After all the greed, you've still got these human needs.
translation.hi_ng: Aur ek last sceme hai, jahan Zuckerberg apne page ko refresh karta rahta hai yeh dekhne ke liye ki kya uske ex-girlfriend ne uska friend request accept kiya hai ya nahin. Last mein yehi sab hota hai. Saare greed ke baad, tumhe human needs ki zaroorat hai.

translation.en: it is interesting for sure
translation.hi_ng: Hann. Yeh zaroor interesting hai.

translation.en:
it would be funny if it was still called f
acemash
translation.hi_ng: Bahut funny hota agar ise abhi bhi facemash kaha jaata.

translation.en: I know, that was a pretty weird name. Even 'Facebook' seemed weird back in the day.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe pata hai ki woh ek achcha weird naam tha.  Un dino mein Facebook bhi weird hua karta tha.

translation.en:
i think it is a dangerous false reality that has changed humanity for 
the worse
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe lagta hai yeh ek khatarnak flase reality hai jisne humanity ko bilkul badal diya hai.

translation.en: millions are addicted to it, and it is proven to shape perceptions in false ways
translation.hi_ng: Lakhon log iske peeche addicted hain and maana jaata hai ki yeh perceptions ko galat tareeke se shape karta hai.

translation.en: Yeah, I think so, too. Though I also think there is a natural balance of humanity and that at some point Facebook will be left in the dust. Or at least it's worst aspects will be. Again, I just think about that last scene. Maybe it's too optimistic, but I think people will abandon Facebook. Maybe not this generation, but the next.
translation.hi_ng: Haan, mujhe bhi aisa hi lagta hai.  Par mujhe aisa bhi lagta hai ki humanity ka ek natural balance bhi hai magar kabhi na kabhi Facebook dust mein mil jayega.  Ya, kam se kam uske worst aspects dust mein honge.  Main phie se us last sceme ke baare mein sochta hoon.  Ho sakta hai main bahut optimistic hoon, but mere khayal se log Facebook abandon kar denge.  Yeh generation nahin to agla generation.

translation.en: Was there anything you didn't like about the movie?
translation.hi_ng: Movie mein kya aisa kuch tha jo tumne like nahin kiya?

translation.en: it seems to be in that direction to some point already.  a lot of damage has been done though
translation.hi_ng: Haan, kuch had tak mujhe laga ki us direction mein ja raha hai.  Kaafi had tak damage to ho chuka hai.

translation.en: I think we are done now, have a good day
translation.hi_ng: I think baat khatam ho gayi.  Tumhara din achcha ho.

translation.en: The Blind Side is a 2009 American biographical sports drama film written and directed by John Lee Hancock, based on the Book The Blind Side: Evolution of a Game by Michael Lewis. The storyline features Michael Oher, an offensive lineman who was drafted by the Baltimore Ravens of the NFL. The film follows Oher from his impoverished upbringing, through his years at Wingate Christian School, his adoption by Sean and Leigh Anne Tuohy, to his position as one of the most highly coveted prospects in college football, then finally becoming first-round pick of the Ravens. It stars Quinton Aaron as Big Mike, Sandra Bullock as Leigh Anne Tuohy, Tim Mcgraw as Sean Tuhoy.
translation.hi_ng: Blind Side is 2009 ki American Biographical sports drama film hai jise John Lee Hancock ne write aur direct kiya hai joki Michael Lewis ki Book The Blind Side: Evolution of a Game pe based hai. Story me Micheal Oher ek offensive lineman hai jo NFL me Baltimore Raven se draft ho jata hai. Film me Oher ki gareeb upbringing aur uske Wingate Christian School k saal, uska Sean aur Leigh Anne Tuohy se adoption se college football me sabse coveted prospect ki journey aur phir finally Raven ki first round pick banna hai. Usme Quinton Aaron as Big Mike,Sandra Bullock as Leigh Anne Tuohy, Tim Mcgraw as Sean Tuhoy hai.

translation.en: Hello! Do you like superhero movies?

translation.en: yes. batman begins! I think this a great batman film. have you seen it?

translation.en: Yes, I have. Christian Bale is my favorite Batman so far.

translation.en: Do you usually check the ratings of movies before you see them?

translation.en: I usually do. but the rating dose not determine whether i will watch the movie or not

translation.en: The film has several great big name actors, which is another reason I like this one and would watch it based on the actors alone
translation.hi_ng: ee film tho bahut great bada actors tha, ee tho dusara reason hi mere kho aacha laga aur mene dekungi bina actors keliye.

translation.en: I agree, there are quite a few great actors in Batman Begins. I like Liam Neeson too, even though he is one of the villains.
translation.hi_ng: ha, bahut sara great actors hi Batman Begins me. mene like karungi Liam Neeson tho bi, vo tho eek villain be hi.

translation.en:
seeing the potential for great actors together on a big screen defiantly gets my interest. along with super heros and villans.  a good 
rating does help me feel like I will not waste my time watching something awful
translation.hi_ng: utna potential hi actors me dekhke big screen mere kho bahut interest aaya tha. milke dono super heros aur villans bhi hi. isko aacha rating help karega , mene time waste mat karungi dusara awful movie dekhke.

translation.en: but the same time will not deter me from a film If i am just into the genre
translation.hi_ng: lekin same time me mene nahi deter karungi ee film se if mene just genre dekhke.

translation.en: I personally prefer good ratings. Even if a movie has many good actors, if it's rated poorly, I usually won't watch it in theaters.
translation.hi_ng: Main personally acchi ratings prefer karta hun .Even agar kisi movie mein kayi acche actors hain lekin agar uski rating kharab hai to main usko usually theaters mein nahi dekhta.

translation.en: I'm not sure if I agree with the Metacritic Score of 70/100, though.
translation.hi_ng: Waise mein sure nahi hun ki mein Metacritic  ke 70/100 score se agree karunga.

translation.en: The 84% on Rotten Tomatoes seems more accurate.
translation.hi_ng: Rotten Tomatoes pe 84%  zyada accurate lagta hai.

translation.en: I will generally have enough patience to wait for a film to be released on DVD/Video if the rating turn me off.
translation.hi_ng: Generally mere paas enough patience hota hai to wait for a film to be released on DVD/Video agar mujhe rating pasand nahi aati.

translation.en: What did you think of the bat scene in the movie?

translation.en: I felt that scene shows the story of this film well, and is thought out.

batman as a child was good step by the filmm
aker to show how his life started out

translation.en: Because this movie is called Batman Begins, I agree that it was appropriate to show Bruce's beginnings.

translation.en:
I think it's ironic that the mugger's name is Joe Chill, but he isn't
 chill if he murders people.

translation.en:
unlikely yes, I think they were going for a mysterious beginning to show how batman came to be.  but still want to leave some mystery as he still develops a phobia to 
 the bats
translation.hi_ng: unlikely haan, mujhe lagta hai wo batman kaise bana k ek mysterious beginning dikhana chahte the, but phir bhi thodi mystery chhodna chahte the ke use bats ka phobia kaise hota hai.

very ironic. mr chill is more of a bone 
chilling murderer.

he got whats coming to him. but 
bruce dosent get to murder him so i think that leaves him wanting revenge

translation.en: I think it helps to establish that Bruce will not directly murder anyone. Even when he burns down the League of Shadows, he doesn't directly kill Ra's al Ghul.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe lagta hai iss ye establish hone me help hoti hai k Bruce kabhi kisi ka directly murder nahi karte. Even jab wo league of Shadows ko jala deta hai, Ra's al Ghul ko directly nahi maarta hai.

translation.en: Injustice should be not be used as a reason to murder, in any case.
