translation.en: I wonder why there is a gap in the Rotton Tomatoes score and the Metacritic score for Wonder Woman
translation.hi_ng: I wonder Rotten Tomatoes score aur Metacritic score me Wonder Woman k liye itna gap kyu hai

translation.en: hello! that is very strange, maybe they have different audiences, did you originally see this as a war movie? I guess i personally separate war movies from super hero movies
translation.hi_ng: hello! ye kaafi strange hai, maybe unki different audience hai, kya tumne originally ise war movie type se dekha? I guess personally main war movies aur super hero movies ko seperate karta hu.

translation.en: I do that too, I think of them both as different genres, even though Wonder Woman was set during World War 1.
translation.hi_ng: main bhi wahi karta hu. Main dono ko alag genre maanta hu , bhale hi Wonder Woman World War 1 k duaran set thi.

translation.en: Yeah I could see them grouping it together, I just usually separate them, I enjoy the actors though, Gal Gadot and Chris Pine are great, how did you feel about their choices?
translation.hi_ng: Haan, main unhen ek saath samoohabaddh karate hue dekh sakata tha, main aamataur par unhen alag karata hoon, main actors ka aanand leta hoon haalaanki, gal gadot aur chris pine mahaan hain, aapako unakee pasand ke baare mein kaisa laga?

translation.en: I thought the casting was great, even though this was the first time I ever heard of Gal Gadot.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe laga ki kaasting bahut achchhee thee, haalaanki yah pahalee baar tha jab mainne gal gadot ke baare mein suna.

translation.en: I was shocked though it was so well received with cirtics considering its a DC film haha, usually Marvel runs the place
translation.hi_ng: Haalaanki main hairaan tha ki yah ek dc movie haaha ko dekhate hue sirtiks ke saath bahut achchhee tarah se praapt hua tha, aamataur par marvel jagah chalaata hai

translation.en: I agree. I think one of the reasons it was well received was because Wonder Woman was trying to end the war, instead of contributing to a growing conflict.
translation.hi_ng: Main sahamat hoon. mujhe lagata hai ki isaka ek kaaran yah tha ki ise achchhee tarah se praapt kiya gaya tha kyonki wonder woman badhate sangharsh mein yogadaan dene ke bajaay yuddh ko samaapt karane kee koshish kar rahee thee.

translation.en: yeah, a lot of the marvel movies tend to just make up a conflict and then go with it instead of going off an existing one. I enjoyed it though, It is interesting the difference in opinions though, I don't know if I would see a second one
translation.hi_ng: Haan, bahut see marvel movies sirph ek sangharsh karane ke lie hotee hain aur phir ek maujooda band hone ke bajaay isake saath jaatee hain. mainne haalaanki isaka aanand liya, haalaanki yah raay mein antar dilachasp hai, mujhe nahin pata ki kya main ek doosare ko dekhoonga

translation.en: I think if Patty Jenkins directs a sequel, it would be as good as the first one. She did a great job with this movie.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe lagata hai ki agar patty jenkins ek seekval ka nirdeshan karatee hai, to yah pahale vaale kee tarah achchha hoga iss movie ke saath unhonne bahut achchha kaam kiya.

translation.en: thats true, if they can keep the cast and crew together I think the chances of it being a hit increase. I believe thats more then 3 exchanges we've had about the movie now
translation.hi_ng: Yah sach hai, agar ve kalaakaaron aur chaalak dal ko ek saath rakh sakate hain to mujhe lagata hai ki yah ek hit virddhi kee sambhaavana hai. mera maanana ​​hai ki 3 se adhik eksachenjon ke baad ab hamane movie ke baare mein socha hai

translation.en: The document just updated for me. One of the things that caught my eye of the movie is how the time period was depicted, especially with how Princess Diana received a photographic plate whereas now we can take selfies. It is an interesting disconnect.
translation.hi_ng: Dastaavez sirph mere lie apadet kiya gaya. movie kee meree nazar mein aane vaalee cheejon mein se ek yah hai ki samay avadhi ko kaise chitrit kiya gaya tha, khaasakar Princess Diana ko photographic plet kaise milee, jabaki ab ham selphee le sakate hain. yah ek dilachasp disconnect hai.

translation.en: Oh mine just updated too, sorry about that. I think thats interesting and a good period for the film, I think the mythology involved behind it was very intriguing
translation.hi_ng: Oh mera bhee adyatan kiya gaya, is baare mein kshama karen. mujhe lagata hai ki movie kelie dilachasp aur ek achchhee avadhi hai, mujhe lagata hai ki isake peechhe shaamil pauraanik katha bahut pecheeda thee

translation.en: I agree. Usually whenever Greek or Roman mythology is presented in a movie it is dense and opaque, but it was easily understood in Wonder Woman.
translation.hi_ng: Main sahamat hoon. aamataur par jab bhee kisee philm mein greek ya roman pauraanik kathaon ko prastut kiya jaata hai to vah ghanee aur apaaradarshee hotee hai, lekin wonder woman mein yah aasaanee se samajh mein aa gaya.

translation.en: Yeah introducing concepts like that can definitely be hard to follow sometimes depending on how they're presented. It's interesting that zues chose amazonian warriors to protect mankind
translation.hi_ng: haan, is tarah kee avadhaaranaon ko pesh karana nishchit roop se kabhee-kabhee paalan karane ke lie kathin ho sakata hai ki ve kaise prastut karate hain. yah dilachasp hai ki zoo ne maanav jaati kee raksha ke lie amejan yoddhaon ko chuna

translation.en: The way Ares was punished was also interesting, with only Zeus able to wound him in the battle.
translation.hi_ng: jis tarah se eres ko dandit kiya gaya tha vah bhee dilachasp tha, keval zeus ne use ladaee mein ghaayal karane mein saksham kiya.

translation.en: I liked that it was only them left, zues and ares had to fight to save mankind, it made it interesting with it being in a time period where the first time in history we had a world war
translation.hi_ng: mujhe yah pasand aaya ki yah keval vaam, zeus aur eres ko maanav jaati ko bachaane ke lie ladana tha, isane ise us samay ke saath dilachasp bana diya jahaan itihaas mein pahalee baar hamane vishv yuddh kiya tha

translation.en: I thought it was interesting that the American pilot crashed near south America, connecting World War 1 to the Amazonian setting was done very well in the film in my opinion.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe laga ki yah dilachasp tha ki american chalak dakshin american ke paas durghatanaagrast ho gaya, pratham vishv yuddh ko amozon se jodakar meree raay mein philm mein bahut achchha kaam kiya gaya.

translation.en: yeah it seems they did a very good job of having the plot points connect with real world situations, the island then being invaded by the germans looking to advance their warfare technology really gives you a sense of good side/bad side
translation.hi_ng: haan, aisa lagata hai ki unhonne vaastavik duniya kee sthitiyon se jude kathaanak binduon ko jodane ka ek bahut achchha kaam kiya hai, is dveep par phir se jangalon dvaara aakraman kiya ja raha hai taaki unakee yuddh takaneek ko aage badhaaya ja sake aur aapako vaastav mein achchhe paksh / bure paksh ka ehasaas ho.

translation.en: Especially with the Germans trying to engineer an even deadlier version of the chemical weapons they had, I think that ties very well into everyone's ingrained mortality.
translation.hi_ng: vishesh roop se germans ke paas raasaayanik hathiyaaron ke ek bhee ghaatak sanskaran ko injeeniyar karane kee koshish kar raha tha, mujhe lagata hai ki har kisee kee nirbaadh mrtyu dar mein bahut achchha sambandh ha

translation.en: I also like that Hippolyta allowed her sister to train Diana, giving her the extra she needed to really stand out from the amazonian warriors
translation.hi_ng: mujhe yah bhee pasand hai ki hippolyta ne apanee bahan ko daayana ko prashikshit karane kee anumati dee thee, jisase use vah atirikt dene kee jaroorat thee jo vaastav mein amaajoniyan yoddhaon se baahar khade hone kee jaroorat thee

translation.en: I felt that was a very feminist-inspired scene, which I really enjoyed seeing in the film. That was a big dynamic in how the World War was almost exclusively fought by men, with the sole woman wanting to end it.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe laga ki yah ek bahut hee naareevaadee-prerit drshy tha, jise philm mein dekhakar mujhe bahut maja aaya. yah ek bada gatisheel tha ki kaise vishv yuddh lagabhag vishesh roop se purushon dvaara lada gaya tha, ekamaatr mahila jo ise samaapt karana chaahatee thee

translation.en: that is a really interesting point that I haven't considered, I know that the film was widely proclaimed to give a voice to feminism but that point really solidifys that
translation.hi_ng: yah vaastav mein ek dilachasp bindu hai jis par mainne vichaar nahin kiya hai, mujhe pata hai ki philm ko vyaapak roop se naareevaad ko ek aavaaj dene ke lie ghoshit kiya gaya tha lekin yah bindu vaastav mein thos hai

translation.en: I really didnt except Sir Patrick to Ares, its an interesting dynamic that really came out.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe vaastav mein sar patrick se ares kee ummeed nahin thee, yah ek dilachasp gatisheel hai jo vaastav mein saamane aaya hai.

translation.en: I thought the scene when Sir Patrick revealed himself as Ares also influenced that, where he wanted to use the Godkiller sword to destroy humanity, but Wonder Woman said no.
translation.hi_ng: maine socha jis scene main Sir Patrick reveal kiya kyonki Ares ne bi influence kiya tha, jahan woh Godkiller sword ko use karke humanity ko destroy karna chatha tha, lekin Wonder woman ne no kah diya.

translation.en: yeah I really didn't except wonder women to be the godkiller although it does make sense
translation.hi_ng: yeah main really expect nahin kiya wonder woman hi godkiller thi although isme koi sense nahin hai

translation.en: I think that was another big feminist point in the movie, in my opinion. The ending of the movie was very heartfelt and connected how wars of the past influence our present when Princess Diana emailed Bruce Wayne
translation.hi_ng: i think woh ek bada feminist point hai movie hai, mere opinion hai.movie ka ending bahut heartfelt tha aur connect kiya ki kaise past wars hamare present ko influence karte hain princess diana ne email kiya bruce wayne ko

translation.en: yeah, I think the dynamic between the all the characters fits really well, linking it all togheter, from diana and bruce, to diana and ares, and ares and zues
translation.hi_ng: haan, mujhe lagta hai characters ki dynamics acchi fit karti hai, sabhi ko link karte hue, diana aur bruce se lekar, diana aur ares thak aur ares aur zues

translation.en: The casting helped make the movie incredible, the charisma and chemistry between every character showed. The scene where Steve hijacked the bomber showed that very well I think.
translation.hi_ng: casting ne help kia movie ko incredible banane ke liye, charisma aur chemistry ke andar character dikhta hai.jo scene jahan steve ne bomber ko hijack kiya acchi tarah dikhta hai.

translation.en: Steve has a really inteseting role in the movie too, providing a lot of support but still not taking over the main role
translation.hi_ng: steve ka bhi accha interesting role hai movie mein, bahut support deta hai lekin phir bhi main role nahi leta

translation.en: His character was an excellent supporting character in my opinion.
translation.hi_ng: uska charcter excellent supporting charcter hai mere khayal se.

translation.en: Hi! So what did you think of the 1990 comedy Home Alone?
translation.hi_ng: Hi! Apko 1990 ki comedy Home Alone kaisi lagi?

translation.en: Hello. I like it. It's very interesting and hilarious to me seeing Joe Pesci in a movie like this since I know him form the more serious movies he did.
translation.hi_ng: Hello. Mujhe acchi lagi. Mujhe Joe Pesci ko aisi interesting aur hilarious movie me dekh ke accha laga kyuki maine unhe jyadatar serious movies me hi dekha hai.

translation.en: Very true! He nailed the role of Harry! All of the actors did! Was he your favorite actor in the film?
translation.hi_ng: Sahi kha! Usne Harry ka role bohot accha nibhaya. Sabhi actors ne accha kam kiya! Kya wah apke favorite the film me?

translation.en: Macaulay Culkin is my favorite in the movie. It was so fun just watching him outsmart 2 grown men.
translation.hi_ng: Is movie me Macaulay Culkin mere favorite the. Unko 2 adults ko outsmart karte dekh bahut maza aaya.

translation.en: Agreed! He was my favorite as well! I can't help but agree with CinemaScore's rating of A as that would be the rating I'd give the film as well!
translation.hi_ng: Agreed! Vah mere bhi favorite the! CinemaScore ke rating A se main bilkul agree karta hu, mai bhi is film ko yahi ratings dunga.

translation.en: Yes this is a christmas classic and deserves an A rating. I feel the critic that described the movie as having an implausible plot is taking the movie more seriously than the creators of the movie intended it to be.
translation.hi_ng: Yes, yah ek christmas classic hai aur A rating ke layak hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki jo critics is movie ko iske implausible plot ke liye criticize karte hai woh is movie ko kuchh jyada hi seriously le rahe hai, creators ka irada serious movie banane ka nahi tha.

translation.en: Very well said! Some of the critics were out of their minds. Especially the one you described as well as the one who called the first half "flat and unsurprising".
translation.hi_ng: Sahi kaha! Kuchh critics pagal ho gaye hain. Khash kar woh jiska apne description diya aur woh jisne first half ko "flat aur unsurprising" bataya.

translation.en: Yes I found the first half very entertaining. I haven't seen this movie in a little wow I might go back and watch it
translation.hi_ng: Han, muje first half bada entertaining laga. Maine ye movie little wow me nahi dekhi, main shayad jaunga aur dekhunga.

translation.en: I feel you! So hard to believe it was released in 1990!
translation.hi_ng: Main apko feel kar sakta hu. Yakin nahin hota ki yeh movie 1990 me release huyi thi.

translation.en: I like the quote "sadistic festival of adult-bashing". Between's Kevin's parents forgetting him and the burglars this movie doesn't make adult looks too bright.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe  "sadistic festival of adult-bashing" yah quote achha lagta hai. Kevin ke parents ka use bhulna aur burglars ke bich yah movie adults ko bahut accha nahi deikhati.

translation.en: That is true! Ha! Pesci and Stern did a great job acting the part as adults who weren't very bright! John Hughes wrote the movie perfectly!
translation.hi_ng: yeh tho sach hein! ha! Pesci aur Stern tho acting ka badiya job kiya voh tho adults ka part bhi kiya jo itna bhi bright nahi tha! john Hughes ne is movie ko perfectly write kiya hein

translation.en: I related to the character Kevin being made fun of  by his family since kids deal with that all the time. The part of the movie always always hits a soft spot for me.
translation.hi_ng: mein tho us kevin character ko relate kar raha hun voh tho fun hein uska family aur kids tho ache tarah deal kar raha tha. is part ka movie tho hamesha soft spot mein hi hit hota.

translation.en: Same here! I honestly felt bad for Kevin at first seeing as how he was ridiculed by his siblings/cousins before being left behind. Like you, i could relate as well to the ridicule aspect of it.
translation.hi_ng: yaha bhi! muje honestly kevin ke liye bura laga kyon ki pehele baar use dekha tho ridiculed mein uska siblings yaani cousins tho uska picha chod diya. aapke tarah, tho mein us ridicule ka aspect se relate kar raha tha

translation.en: I wonder what kind of job Kevin's dad worked that he could afford to fly that many people to Paris for christmas. I blame him for all of this!
translation.hi_ng: muje tho acharya laga ki voh kevin ka dad se work kar raha hein aur voh fly karne ka afford nahi kar saka tho kaafi people paris jaathe christmas ke liye. mein tho usse hi blame karunga

translation.en: That is true! And plus they housed the entire family the night before their departure.
translation.hi_ng: voh tho sach hein! aur uska pura family tho us night mein departure ho gaye hein

translation.en: How much of rush do you have to be in to forget a whole human being. I guess nobody in the McCallister family was an early bird either. Alarms didn't always exist.
translation.hi_ng: pura human being ke liye kitna rush karenge. mein tho koi McCallister ka family bird hota tho mein guess nahi kiya.  alarms tho nahi exist hien

translation.en: No kidding! I wonder that as well! Then they don't even realize he's missing until Kate discovered it during the middle of their flight. So awful!
translation.hi_ng: are kidding mat karna! mein bhi yeh sab wonder kartha! jab tak koi realize nahi hote tab kate ko koi flight mein nahi hein kar ke. yeh tho awful hein

translation.en: I couldn't imagine anything other than my child being in danger convincing me to hitch hike with a polka band. I found that part very funny.
translation.hi_ng: muje tho imagine bhi nahi kar saktha ki yeh sab danger tha mera childhood mein lekin voh tho polka band se hitch hike huva. muje tho us part ko badi funny laga

translation.en: Same here - and in a moving van at that. That was incredibly hilarious!
translation.hi_ng: yahi bhi- aur voh moving van tho badiya thi. voh tho incredibly hilarious hein

translation.en: Imagine going through the trouble of flying halfway across the world for a holiday and not even being able to enjoy your time on the trip. That wouldn't be good at all for me I would be so mad.
translation.hi_ng: soch le agar yeh halfway flying mein troble hein aur jab voh holiday ke liye jaa raha hein lekin usko us time ko enjoy nahi kar saka. tho yeh sab ache nahi hein na yeh tho mad ke tarah hein

translation.en: I know, right? At that point, I felt sorry for Kate as well. Then on top of that, you can only land a flight to Scranton and while there, all flights to Chicago were booked. Talk about stressful!
translation.hi_ng: mujhe pata hai, right? Us point par mujhe Kate ke liye sorry feel huya. Aur uske top par, tum sirf Scranton ki flight land kar sakte ho aur jab tum wahan ho, Chicago ki sari flights book thi. Kitna stressful hai!

translation.en: For sure very stressful. I wonder what the family was thinking back in Paris at the apartment of Kevin's Uncle.
translation.hi_ng: Han sure very stressful. I wonder wo family Paris mein Kevin ke uncle ke apartment mein kya think kar rahi hogi.

translation.en: Their vacation was certainly ruined while Kevin was in the process of rigging up their house with booby traps for Harry and Marv! That was a hilarious scene as well!
translation.hi_ng: Unki vacation certainly ruin hogayi hogi jab Kevin unke house ko booby traps se rig karne ke process mein tha Harry aur Marv ke liye! Wo scene bhi hilarious tha

translation.en: Kevin was a kid genius. Rigging up the house like mini macgyver. Of course seeing Marv and Harry get tricked was very funny. Thank god Marley got there before Kevin got hurt.
translation.hi_ng: Kevin kid genius tha. mini macgyver ki tarah house ko rig karne mein. Ofcourse Marv aur Harry ko trick hote dekhna funny tha. Thank god Marley Kevin ke hurt hone se pehle wahan pahunch gaya.

translation.en: You're right! Thankfully he did get there just in time and the cops came shortly after to arrest Harry and Marv!
translation.hi_ng: Tum sahi ho! Thankfully wo wahan time par pahunch gaya aur cops thode time mein Harry aur Marv ko arrest karne aa gaye

translation.en: I love seeing the whole family reunited at the end. Having Kevin realize he didn't want his family to go away was very touching.
translation.hi_ng: Muje whole family ko last mein reunite hote dekhkar kafi accha laga. Kevin ka ye realize karna ki wo apni family ko door nahi jane dena chahta bohat touching tha.

translation.en: It was - especially after he sees the family was still gone on Christmas day at first before Kate entered the house calling for him.
translation.hi_ng: Han wo tha - especially jab wo dekhta hai ki uski family Christmas Day par abhi bhi gayi huyi hai Kate ke ghar mein enter karke bulane se pehle

translation.en: I do find it a little interesting that no one informed the family about the events that took place while they were gone. I would figure the police might be interested to talk to Kevin's parents.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe ye interesting laga ki kisine family ko nahi inform kiya ki jab wo gaye they tab ghar mein kya events huye. Mujhe lagta hai police shayad Kevin ke parents se baat karne mein interested ho.

translation.en: I agree but it was hilarious when Buzz yelled "Kevin what did you do to me room?" and Kevin ran off at the end. I enjoyed discussing Home Alone with you today!
translation.hi_ng: I agree jab Buzz yell karta hai  "Kevin what did you do to me room?" wo bohat hilarious tha. Aur end me Kevin bhag jata hai. Mujhe aaj tumse Home Alone discuss karke kafi acha laga.

translation.en:
Noah writes to Allie every day for a year but Anne intercepts the letters and they never reach
Allie. Noah enlists with Fin to fight in World War II, where Fin is killed in battle. Allie
volunteers in a hospital for wounded soldiers, where she meets officer Lon Hammond Jr., a
young lawyer who comes from old Southern money. The two become engaged, to the
delight of Allie's parents.
When Noah returns from the war, his father has sold their home so that Noah can buy the
abandoned house. While visiting Charleston, Noah witnesses Allie and Lon kissing at a
restaurant; he convinces himself that if he restores the house, Allie will come back to him.
Allie is startled to read in the newspaper that Noah has completed the house to the
specifications she made years before.
translation.hi_ng: Noah Allie ko roz ek letter likhta hai ek saal k liye but wo letters kabhi allie ko nahi reach karte. Noah Fin k sath enlist hojata hai World War II me fight karne k liye , jaha Fin mar jata hai. Allie wounded soldiers k hospital k liye volunteer karti hai jaha use officer Lon Hammond Jr. ek young lawyer milta hai jo Old Southern money wala hai. Dono engaged ho jate hai Allie k parents khush hojate hai. Jab Noah war se wapas aata hai to uske pita apna ghar bech dete hai taaki noah abandoned ghar le sakte. Charleston me Noah Allie aur Lon ko restaurant me kiss karte hue dekh leta hai. Wo khud ko convince kar leta hai k agar usne ghar ko restore kar liye to allie uske paas wapas aajayegi. Allie newspaper me padh k startle hojati hai Noah us specifications ko pura kar chuka jo usne kaafi saal pahle banaye the

translation.en: Do you typically watch movies like Monster's University?

translation.en: Typically no since i generally like to watch anime. But if the franchise is one i watched when i was a kid. Then I usually will make a effort to see it.

translation.en: And i agree those scores kinda seem rather low.

translation.en: I understand. Just by glancing at the ratings, do you think you'd make an effort to go see the prequel? Or would the score discourage you from seeing the film?

translation.en:
Id still see it despite bad reviews. I generally like to decide things by myself to see if i like it or not. Like if 99% of people say its bad or good. I usually won't follow what i hear. I just go and experience it for myself. And then from there I usually say its cool or 
say its bad.
translation.hi_ng: Main isse bure reviews milne ke baad bhi dekhunga. Main zayadtar cheezein khud dekh kar decide krna pasand krta huin ki mujhe pasand hai ya nhi. Jaise agar 99% log kehte hai ki ye buri hai ya achhi. Main aamtaur par baatein sunn kar unke peeche nhi jata. Main bas chala jata huin or khud se experience krta huin. Aur phir main aamtaur par batata huin ke ye badiya hai ya buri.

translation.en: Makes sense. I typically only pay attention to the ratings when it's a director who I am familiar with. If I know that their work is usually phenomenal and a particular movie has awful ratings, I usually will wait to hear from friends/family before paying to see it.
translation.hi_ng: Samajh mein aata hai. Main jayadatar tab ratings pe dhayan deta huin jab main director ko janta huin. Agar mujhe pata hai ki aamtaur par unka kam bahut shaandaar hai or uss ek movie ke bahut buri ratings, main aamtaur par uspe paise lagane se pehle friends/ family se sunn leta huin.

translation.en: Third, Islamism has historic and philosophic ties to Marxism-Leninism. Sayyid Qutb, the Egyptian Islamist thinker, accepted the Marxist notion of stages of history, only adding an Islamic postscript to them; he predicted that an eternal Islamic era would come after the collapse of capitalism and Communism. Ali Shariati , the key intellectual behind the Iranian revolution of 1978-79, translated Franz Fanon, Che Guevara, and Jean-Paul Sartre into Persian. More broadly, the Iranian analyst Azar Nafisi observes that Islamism “takes its language, goals, and aspirations as much from the crassest forms of Marxism as it does from religion. Its leaders are as influenced by Lenin, Sartre, Stalin, and Fanon as they are by the Prophet.”
translation.hi_ng: Tisra, Aetihasik rup se Islamic ka Marksvad aur leninvad se aetihasik aur darshnik sambandh he. Misra ke Islamic Chintak Saiyad Kutb ne history ke marksvadi vikas ke charan ki avdharana ko swikar kiya tha aur  only adding an Islamic postscript to them; he predicted that an eternal Islamic era would come after the collapse of capitalism and Communism. Ali Shariati , the key intellectual behind the Iranian revolution of 1978-79, translated Franz Fanon, Che Guevara, and Jean-Paul Sartre into Persian. More broadly, the Iranian analyst Azar Nafisi observes that Islamism “takes its language, goals, and aspirations as much from the crassest forms of Marxism as it does from religion. Its leaders are as influenced by Lenin, Sartre, Stalin, and Fanon as they are by the Prophet.”
